name: Fantastic Action Fishing Game - With Fish And Action
name_original: Fantastic Action Fishing Game - With Fish And Action
description:
What to do

Catch as many fish as you can and sell them for the highest profit! Use the money to upgrade your fishing rod or buy better bait to attract bigger fish. Can you unlock all upgrades?

How to play

Hit the button when the fish is not pulling to reel it in. Get it to the surface to make the catch. If you reel in while the fish is pulling, you allow it to get deeper in the water. If this happens too often, your fishing line will snap. The rarity of the fish determines it's base price and the level the final price you can achieve. Go to the market and hopefully choose the highest bid. Good luck!

Upgrades

Fishing Rod
Makes catching higher level fish easier.

Fishing Line
You are allowed to make more errors before your fishing line snaps.

Bait
One time use. Attract higher level fish.

Scarecrow
Keep the bird from snatching your precious catch!
